sentences.sContent: You can name each window, and you can place a status bar at the bottom of each window to differentiate one from another.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can name each window, and you can place a status bar at the bottom of each window to differentiate one from another.
sentences.sCn: 可以给每个窗口指定名称，还可以在每个窗口的底部显示一个状态栏以帮助区分窗口。

sentences.sContent: My wife found this at the bottom of the measure you borrowed yesterday.
sentences.sContent_eng: My wife found this at the bottom of the measure you borrowed yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 我老婆在你昨天晚上借走的称底盘上发现了这个。
